title: My lvl 17 account which is not connected with an email is stolen.
body:
Dear Riot,

--A liar changed my another account's password, and connected with his own email. Please help me. 

The detail is as below:

I believed a liar who told me to charge RP on my level 17 account , so I gave him the id and password. Then I couldn't log in that account! Apparently he changed the password. The most disappointing part is that I didn't connect that account with my email, so when I'm pressing "forget my password" to change my password, it seems that the liar has connected it with an email. It cost me lots of time to play on this little account and I have lots of friends there !!! Please help me get back the account.!!!!! Thank you!!! I will connect it with my email immediately I get it back.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To contact with me, my email is --------------------------------------- (You see it's the same word as my stolen account's password before it was changed)

By the way, the liar's id is  "-------------------", it's lvl 7 so maybe it's not his main account. He told me he was a  korean streamer... LOL I was so stupid to trust him.

Please help me !

replies.body: Ah man, sorry to hear you got scammed like that. It's never a good idea to give any your login info. I went ahead and removed all of your personal info like your email to prevent anyone from hassling you, but you're gonna want to reach out to our account recovery team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to get that account back!
